desc: The Idea Space makes mindfulness as real as stars, cells, and atoms to give meaning to experiences that were once ineffable. Your idea space consists of your thoughts, emotions, sensations, perceptions, and the null set (i.e. nothing). It is uncountably deep and has zero measure (and therefore, is invisible to others).

layout.text: "If a picture is worth 1,000 words, then an idea is worth 1,000 pictures."
